name: Avoid Programs mixing usage of do-while or (and) do-until (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures having to many "do-while" and "do-until".
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures (with a non limited usage) of do-while or do-until.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedure full name
rationale: Good programming practice is to stick to one of the 2 (two)constructs to maintain consistency.
remediation: Limit the usage of do-while and do-until.
alternativeName: Avoid Programs mixing usage of do-while or (and) do-until (PL1)
